channel.title: Cricket on Raunak Shrestha
channel.description: Recent content in Cricket on Raunak Shrestha

item.title: Data Speaks: Nepal Premier League (NPL) 2024
item.description:
The 2024 Nepal Premier League (NPL) recently rocked Kathmandu, Nepal, transforming the TU International Cricket Ground into a vibrant hub of cricketing action from November 30th to December 21st 2024, captivating fans across the nation. The brainchild of the Cricket Association of Nepal (CAN), the NPL proved a resounding success, showcasing Nepali cricket to the world and solidifying its place on the global map. The tournament ignited a wave of excitement throughout the country, earning the well-deserved title of ‘Festival of Himalayas’.

Eight fierce franchise teams, Sudurpaschim Royals (SPR), Janakpur Bolts (JAB), Chitwan Rhinos (CHR), Karnali Yaks (KAY), Kathmandu Gurkhas (KAG), Biratnagar Kings (BIK), Pokhara Avengers (POA), and Lumbini Lions (LUL) clashed in a thrilling 32-match spectacle. In the NPL final, Janakpur Bolts triumphed over Sudurpaschim Royals by five wickets to claim the title.

Here is my attempt to dive into the data and analyze how the NPL teams and players performed throughout the competition.

Most Runs in NPL 2024
